name: The Wing
description:
TheWing ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

you've just got a new job at TheWing, a (kinda shady) company that helps people get dates. you will help clients by pretending to be them, and woo their romantic interests for petty cash.  

as for you, you don't really fit in. the world of romance is foreign to you. and you seem to be foreign to everyone else.

made for UCSC's ARTG 120/CMPM 120.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
